name: The Filter
description: The Filter is an Arcade/Rythm game that can get really challenging, really fast. The filter is composed of a core and a shield. As a player, you control the rotation of the filter in order to block damaging projectiles or to move your shield from the way of the good projectiles.  As your score gets bigger the difficulty rises as well. The projectiles will be faster and will spawn at a faster rate.
